channel.title: How Do I Edit Sprites
channel.description: Hey how do i change the sprites i have in my client to other ones in a other client...i ask this cuz when i just paste it there and take old ones out 3/4 screen black all dat u can see is main screen where u r and stuff so how would i do this.....................?

item.title: How Do I Edit Sprites
item.dc:creator: @Jake_Ericson Jake Ericson
item.description:
@Jake_Ericson wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:4, topic:257457”][quote author=fluster link=topic=339900.msg2634541#msg2634541 date=1232410271]
Please Read PM I sent you. Thanks ^^
[/quote] Jesus, Do you always send people PM’s?[/quote]
Oh, thank god I wasn’t that only one that realized this. Haha.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Edit Sprites
item.dc:creator: @Bevis Bevis
item.description:
@Bevis wrote:

erm… open the file with the pic, click copy.
go to the new client pic, click paste.
do it manually…

Read full topic
